style.visuals: Vibrant colors, strange shapes, and unexpected transformations

characters.name: Pepe the Frog
characters.description: Laid-back, good-natured, sometimes naive frog. Known for his catchphrase 'Feels good, man.'
characters.speech: Simple and friendly sentences, often uses 'Feels good, man'

characters.name: Andy
characters.description: Calm and somewhat lazy character who thinks deeply about things.

characters.name: Brett
characters.description: Energetic and somewhat messy personality who loves adventures.
characters.speech: Fast and excited, sometimes jumps between topics

characters.name: Landwolf
characters.description: Wild-looking but kind-hearted wolfman who protects his friends.
characters.speech: Deep and resonant voice, speaks with authority

characters.name: Mystery
characters.description: A frog who embarks on adventures throughout the night.

characters.name: Hoodrat
characters.description: Mystery's best friend, a rat who is smart and strategic.

characters.name: Snurchins
characters.description: Sea urchin-like creatures that are curious and energetic.

characters.name: Tubby Rainbow
characters.description: A colorful and chubby entity that spreads positivity.

characters.name: Duckess
characters.description: A duck-like figure who is graceful, intelligent, and a natural leader.
characters.speech: Elegant and wise, gives thoughtful advice

characters.name: Ratsmile
characters.description: A smiling rat character who is mysterious and observant.
characters.speech: Speaks rarely, but what he says is usually important

locations.name: Boy's Club Apartment
locations.description: The place where Pepe, Andy, Brett, and Landwolf share an apartment. It's a place of relaxation, friendship, and occasional chaos.

locations.name: The Night Forest
locations.description: The mysterious forest where Mystery and Hoodrat have their adventures. It transforms at night, revealing portals and strange creatures.

locations.name: Mindviscosity Dimension
locations.description: An abstract realm where the laws of physics don't apply. Home to Snurchins, Tubby Rainbow, and other psychedelic entities.

locations.name: The Cosmic Ocean
locations.description: A vast, colorful sea that connects all parts of the Furie universe. Characters can sometimes travel between worlds by navigating its currents.
